title: Deck of defence
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| Type | Miscellaneous item                                                                    |
| :--- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name | deck of defence                                                                       |
| Icon | [![Deck of defence.png](/images/c/c8/Deck_of_defence.png)](/File:Deck_of_defence.png) |

|   |                                                                                   |
| - | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A deck of magical cards, most of which defend the user from harm in various ways. |

The **deck of defence** selects its cards from the [archetype decks](/Decks#Archetype_decks "Decks") across versions according to the following table, selecting each deck with equal probability. Since archetype decks contain varying numbers of cards, the probabilities for individual cards in the [physical deck](/Decks#Composition "Decks") are not necessarily equal.

| pre-[0.14](/0.14 "0.14")                                                                       | [0.14](/0.14 "0.14")                                                                           | [0.15](/0.15 "0.15")                                                                           | [0.16](/0.16 "0.16")                                                                           | [0.17](/0.17 "0.17")                                                                           |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Battle](/Deck_of_battle "Deck of battle") [Emergency](/Deck_of_emergency "Deck of emergency") | [Battle](/Deck_of_battle "Deck of battle") [Emergency](/Deck_of_emergency "Deck of emergency") | [Battle](/Deck_of_battle "Deck of battle") [Emergency](/Deck_of_emergency "Deck of emergency") | [Battle](/Deck_of_battle "Deck of battle") [Emergency](/Deck_of_emergency "Deck of emergency") | [Battle](/Deck_of_battle "Deck of battle") [Emergency](/Deck_of_emergency "Deck of emergency") |

## History

This deck was removed in [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), along with most others.

- [Cards](/Cards "Cards")

html:
Deck of defence

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
Type Miscellaneous item
Name deck of defence
Icon
A deck of magical cards, most of which defend the user from harm in various ways.

The deck of defence selects its cards from the archetype decks across versions according to the following table, selecting each deck with equal probability. Since archetype decks contain varying numbers of cards, the probabilities for individual cards in the physical deck are not necessarily equal.

pre-0.14 0.14 0.15 0.16 0.17

Battle
Emergency

Battle
Emergency

Battle
Emergency

Battle
Emergency

Battle
Emergency

The possible cards across versions in the are shown in the table below.
